summary: The module implements a Maui‑style lexical matching system for the Annif framework. It generates candidate subject terms from input text, converts these candidates into feature vectors using token‑set statistics and IDF weighting, and trains a bagging ensemble of decision‑tree classifiers to rank and predict the most relevant subjects.
business_intent: To enhance automatic subject indexing and document classification by combining lexical term extraction with machine‑learning ranking, enabling more accurate and scalable annotation of textual resources.
